P

Pipe - Class in LongPipes
Pipe is the abstract class which has access methods (Getters and Setter) plus an abstract method to calculate the additional cost of a pie Note: as the class is abstract a "Pipe" object cannot be made.
Pipe() - Constructor for class LongPipes.Pipe
 
Pipe(int, int, boolean, double, double) - Constructor for class LongPipes.Pipe
 
PipeTypeDetector(int, int, int, boolean, boolean, boolean, double, double) - Method in class LongPipes.Backend
Based on the attributes of the pipe the method determines if a pipe can be produced by the company, and if so what type (So it can use the correct constructor)
PipeTypeFive - Class in LongPipes
PipeTypeFive is a class which has access methods (Getters and Setter) plus A method to calculate the additional costs of a pipe based on its unique attributes
PipeTypeFive() - Constructor for class LongPipes.PipeTypeFive
Basic constructor
PipeTypeFive(int, int, boolean, double, double) - Constructor for class LongPipes.PipeTypeFive
Complex constructor - calls super constructor method (Currently PipeTypeFour Until it reaches the Pipe Class where its constructed)
